SEARCH
Modul CineTrack
Package org.com.controller.dashboard

Klasse GenreRatingStatisticController

java.lang.Object
org.com.controller.dashboard.GenreRatingStatisticController
public class GenreRatingStatisticController extends Object
Controller for managing and visualizing genre-based rating statistics in the dashboard. Displays ratings (e.g., personal and IMDb) for different genres in a bar chart.
Version:
1.0
Autor:
Umut

  • Methodendetails

    • setChartContainer

      public void setChartContainer(javafx.scene.layout.VBox chartContainer)
      Sets the container for the genre rating chart.
      Parameter:
      chartContainer - The VBox container to hold the chart.

    • addGenreRatingStatistic

      public void addGenreRatingStatistic(List<Cinematic> cinematics, List<Type> types, List<State> states) throws IOException
      Adds a genre rating statistic chart to the dashboard.
      Parameter:
      cinematics - The list of cinematic objects to analyze.
      types - The list of media types (e.g., Movie, Series) to filter.
      states - The list of states (e.g., Watched, ToWatch) to filter.
      Löst aus:
      IOException - If the FXML file for the chart view cannot be loaded.

    • initializeChart

      private void initializeChart(List<Cinematic> cinematics, List<Type> types, List<State> states)
      Initializes the genre rating chart with the provided data and sets up input listeners.
      Parameter:
      cinematics - The list of cinematic objects to analyze.
      types - The list of media types to filter.
      states - The list of states to filter.

    • updateChart

      private void updateChart(List<Cinematic> cinematics, List<Type> types, List<State> states)
      Updates the genre rating chart based on the provided data and filters.
      Parameter:
      cinematics - The list of cinematic objects to analyze.
      types - The list of media types to filter.
      states - The list of states to filter.
